EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Webinar Invite - Any Workload Any Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I thought you might be interested in the upcoming live webinar: Any Workload Any Cloud <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14883/340843]]>
Date: 4th December 2018 Time: 10:30am SGT (1 Hour)
SAVE YOUR SPOT <[[https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14883/340843]]>
In today's enterprise, the CIO has a lot of choice about how and where they run their applications. With all the hype about moving to the cloud, the reality is that a large percentage of enterprise workloads still run on-premises due to technical complexity, data privacy, and security concerns.
Join us on this webinar as we discuss: - Choosing the right runtime for your workload - Understanding the layers of application abstraction - Introducing Pivotal Cloud Foundry
Featured Speakers: - David Kari, Senior Manager of Platform Architecture ANZ, Pivotal - Pas Apicella, Advisory Platform Architect APJ, Pivotal
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
